title: Brut
insight: You sweat more in high pressure situations, which makes you smell.

title: Chase Bank
insight: Brits are uncomfortable talking about money, but Americans aren't.

title: Eurostar
smp: See things you wouldn’t see from the air
insight: You miss detailed scenery when you travel by plane.

title: Halfords
smp: We speak Bike so you don’t have to.
insight: Bicycle owners don't know what the bike's parts are called.
endline: We speak Bike so you don’t have to.

title: Paul Smith
smp: A Paul Smith tie makes you hard to forget.
insight: No one stands out in a suit anymore because they don’t wear a tie.

title: Rustlers
smp: Rustlers will ensure your night out gets a happy ending.
insight: Drama can ruin a night out.

title: Wotsits
smp: Wotsits are so addictive they should be illegal.
insight: Cheese releases the same chemical in our brains as hard drugs.
